show.description: Show information about a specific callout

messages.done: ‚ÑπÔ∏è If you have finished your response, please type "{done}".
messages.enter-amount-of-money: ‚ÑπÔ∏è Please enter an amount of money.
messages.enter-content: ‚ÑπÔ∏è You may respond in multiple lines. Please send your response only after you have finished writing. Markdown formatting is supported.
messages.enter-lots-of-text: ‚ÑπÔ∏è You may respond in multiple lines. Please send your response only after you have finished writing.
messages.enter-password: ‚ÑπÔ∏è Please enter a password. For security, it's advisable to delete your response after sending to prevent it from remaining in the chat history.
messages.enter-text: ‚ÑπÔ∏è Please keep your response brief, ideally in one sentence.
messages.multiple-addresses-allowed: ‚ÑπÔ∏è You can enter one or more addresses.
messages.multiple-emails-allowed: ‚ÑπÔ∏è You can enter one or more emails.
messages.multiple-numbers-allowed: ‚ÑπÔ∏è Please enter one or more numbers.
messages.multiple-selections-allowed: ‚ÑπÔ∏è Please make your selection by typing the number choices. Multiple selections are allowed, please send a separate message for each of your selection.
messages.multiple-values-allowed: ‚ÑπÔ∏è You can enter multiple values by sending each value separately.
messages.only-one-selection-allowed: ‚ÑπÔ∏è Please make your selection by typing the number of your choice or pressing the button of your choice. Only one selection is allowed.
messages.only-one-value-allowed: ‚ÑπÔ∏è You can only enter one value.

message.select-detail-callout: ‚ùì Which Callout would you like to get more information displayed about? Choose a number

messages.callout-start-response: ‚ùì Would you like to respond to the callout?
messages.no-active-callouts: üòî Sorry, there are currently no active callouts..
messages.not-a-selection-message: ü§î Please select the number of one of the possible answers.
messages.not-the-right-file-type: ü§î Please send a file of type {type}.
